Fatima Rushdi (1908-1996) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ egwu, onye nduzi ihe nkiri, na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri
Rushdi bụ otu n'ime ndị ọsụ ụzọ nke ihe nkiri Egypt.

A mụrụ ya na Alexandria, Fatima Rushdi kwagara Cairo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ ka o wee bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri. Enweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla, ma na-asụ naanị Arabic, ọ malitere otu ihe nkiri nke ya na 1926 wee gaa North Africa. Onye nduzi ihe nkiri nke Chanin-Aziz hụrụ ya n'anya ma mee ka ọ mụta ịgụ na ide. A maara ya dị ka "Bernhardt nke Ọwụwa Anyanwụ" maka ịmegharị ọtụtụ ọrụ Sarah Bernhardt a ma ama, gụnyere Mark Anthony na Julius Caesar
Na ngwụcha afọ 1920, Rushdi gara njem ime ihe nkiri na mba ofesi
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Beirut, Jaffa, Haifa, Latakia, Baghdad, na Tunisia na Algeria
Ọ gakwara South America ma rụọ ọrụ na Santos, São Paolo, Rio de Janeiro, na Buenos Aires.

Ihe nkiri mbụ ọ pụtara na ya bụ na Ibrahim Lama's Faji Canal Fawq Al-Haram na 1928. N'afọ 1933, o duziri ihe nkiri mbụ ya na naanị ya, al-Zarwaj, nke emere na Paris. Enweghị mbipụta dị ndụ, na n'akwụkwọ ncheta ya nke afọ 1970, o kwuru na ya gbara ihe nkiri ahụ ọkụ. N'ime ihe nkiri ahụ, ọ pụtara dị ka nwanyị nna ya manyere ịlụ di na nwunye na-enweghị obi ụtọ nke nwụrụ n'ụzọ dị mwute na njedebe
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri nke Kamal Selim, nke gụnyere ihe nkiri nke eziokwu The Will al- CanalAzima (1939), ebe ọ na-egosi dika nwa agbọghọ na-arụ ọrụ na-ahụ nwa nwoke onye agbata obi ahụ n'anya
Ọ pụtara n'ihe nkiri ikpeazụ ya n'afọ 1955, n'ọrụ nke abụọ na Ahmad Diya Destiny al-Din's Da Destiny / Let Me Live
N'afọ ndị 1960, Rushdi haziri salon maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na ụmụ akwụkwọ na Cairo Higher Institute for Drama Studies.
